import{createSlice}from"@reduxjs/toolkit";var initialState={isLogin:localStorage.getItem("userInfo")!==null?true:false};// console.log("isLogin: " + initialState);
var LoginSlice=createSlice({name:"login",initialState:initialState,reducers:{userLogin:function userLogin(state){state=true;},userLogout:function userLogout(state){state=false;}}});export var LoginActions=LoginSlice.actions;export default LoginSlice.reducer;
